meanings.sent1: The orderer requested a large pizza for delivery.
meanings.sent2: The orderer filled out the form with their contact information.
meanings.sent3: The orderer decided to treat themselves to a new book.
meanings.sent4: As the orderer of the group, she always knew what everyone wanted.
meanings.sent5: The orderer's job was to make sure everything arrived on time.

meanings.definition: A person who arranges or organizes something.
meanings.sent1: The orderer carefully planned the seating arrangement for the event.
meanings.sent2: The orderer coordinated the schedule for the team meeting.
meanings.sent3: The orderer was known for color-coding everything in the office.
meanings.sent4: She was the orderer of chaos, bringing structure to the project.
meanings.sent5: The orderer's attention to detail made the event run smoothly.
